r. b. cattell.gloss: American psychologist (born in England) who developed a broad theory of human behavior based on multivariate research (1905-1998)

r. buckminster fuller.gloss: United States architect who invented the geodesic dome (1895-1983)

rb.gloss: a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali metal group

rbc.gloss: a mature blood cell that contains hemoglobin to carry oxygen to the bodily tissues

rbi.gloss: a run that is the result of the batter's performance
